Coordinates extracted from multiple sources confirm the location of Bagjata Mine in East Singhbhum District, Jharkhand, India. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Jaduguda (https://mronline.org/2023/11/17/jaduguda-uranium-mining-cluster/). Bagjata Mine is part of the Jaduguda uranium mining cluster and is located 25 km east of Jaduguda

web_search_companies.notes: UCIL is a state-owned company responsible for uranium mining and processing in India.
